resources.string: Numb
You\'re into the Numb. Not the song, but the storyline. Be wise and survive. See you at the end.
I\'m Ready to Go!
Hmm.. Lets See what you got
Intro: You\'re in a remote forest house surrounded by huge tall trees. Its peaceful, sunny afternoon. You stay with your friends there. Dinner is ready.
Skip Dinner! Not Hungry
Did you say Food? I\'m always in!
As planned, your friends leave for the camp that night in a nearby place. They ask you to come for the camp.
I would love to, lets Go!
Sorry, gotta take care of the house
End of Flow: So you leave to the camp and have fun
After failing to convince you, your friends leave for the camp, you\'re alone at the house.
Party Time!
Sleep tight!
Suddenly there comes a continuous spooky sound from the woods. You wake up to that sound
Go back to sleep
Go out to check it out
Finally satisfied with the Solo Party you had.
Sleep!
Listen to loud Music all night long!
End of Flow: So you listen to music all night and next day your friends return and you have fun again.
Explore other interesting story line
Play the alternate storyline
The spooky sound doesn\'t seem to stop, starts again.
Go out to check it out.
Freak out! Panic!
End of Flow: Since you panicked, you faint. Stop being afraid. Survive the game.
You stand at your doorstep, look far into the dark woods kissed by the Moon Rays of the night. The sound stops.
\"That was just my imagination\!\"
\"Something doesn\'t seem right\"
\(That was a Brave one.\)You go back to sleep. The next morning, your friends arrive.
Talk to them about this incident
Remain calm and try to forget it.
\(Yeah\, seems so.\)You go back to sleep. The next morning, your friends arrive.
Talk to them about this incident
Remain calm and try to forget it.
You tell them about this incident. Everyone bursts into laughter. But you know what happened.
\"I\'m not joking! nor am I sick\"
\"...\", walk away
\*Dinner Time\*,everyone has dinner.Everybody makes their bed and goes to sleep. There is this spooky sound from the woods again!
Just don\'t wake up.
Get up and look at your friends\' reaction
Your friends wake you up, and ask whether you were talking about this, the morning.
Nod your head with worry
\"... Come lets go check it out\"
Your friends are shocked, look worried. They ask you whether you were talking about this, the morning
Nod your head with worry
\"... Come lets go check it out\"
You gain courage and two of you among others decide to walk out and check the source. Its damn dark outside.
Take a torch
Take a lantern
Both of you walk fast towards the source of the sound, you\'re sweating and breathing hard. Finally you find the sound coming from the top of a tall tree in the woods
Focus the light onto the branches
Look at your friend with fear.
The spooky sound stops, You\'ve no Idea whats happening.
Return back silently
Try to investigate further
Since there is no clue, you return back to the cottage and tell friends that you find nothing
Try to sleep
Try to think about the solution
The next morning, there is not much communication between y\'all. Everyone is worried thinking about the incident last night
Crack a joke to make them smile
Sing a song to make them smile
While you make them feel happy, there is this \'Spooky sound again\', and this time somebody running into the woods through the bushes
Run towards the source
Wait for your friends\' reaction
\(Brave enough\!\) You chase the object piercing through the bushes towards the tree, beneath which you stood, the previous day
Run Faster
Try to look at who it could be
Your friend signals you to join him to go find the solution to the problem
Run towards the source
Wait for him to step front
You see a man running towards the tree, you yell at him and ask him to stop. He turns around baffled.
Ask him why he is here
Ask him about the spooky sound
